lead_paragraph: Regulators are investigating whether restaurants throughout China are creating food hazards by cooking with recycled oil tainted with food waste or even sewage.
snippet: Regulators are investigating whether restaurants throughout China are creating food hazards by cooking with recycled oil tainted with food waste or even sewage.

headline.main: Recycled Cooking Oil Found to Be Latest Hazard in China
headline.print_headline: Recycled Cooking Oil Found To Be Latest Hazard in China
